original_text: Who was there among all the gods of those nations that my fathers utterly destroyed, that could deliver his people out of mine hand, that your God should be able to deliver you out of mine hand?
korean_text: 내 조상들이 진멸한 모든 나라의 그 모든 신들 중에 누가 능히 그의 백성을 내 손에서 건져내었기에 너희 하나님이 능히 너희를 내 손에서 건지겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Who was there among all the gods of those nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그 모든 민족의 신들 중에 누가 있었는가

sentences.original_text: that could deliver his people out of mine hand
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 백성을 내 손에서 구원할 수 있었는가

sentences.original_text: that your God should be able to deliver you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 하나님이 너희를 구원할 수 있겠는가
